file_content.text: Just waiting on you now, agent.
Nar Shaddaa again. Casinos, death sticks and head games with Watcher X.
Think selling out to the Republic will be more fun?
We get to lie to a whole new group of people.
I'm looking forward to it.
You know it. Don't forget to squeeze them for all they're worth.
Watcher X really bothered you, didn't he?
You're still bitter, huh?
Nah. He was a fun screwball.
You speak like a poet, as always, Kaliyo.
We're doing this for the Empire. Don't forget where your allegiance is.
We're not "selling out."
I won't. And I promise, if it looks like you're flipping sides for real... I'll shoot you. It's what friends are for.
You are the conscience of our team, as always, Kaliyo.
For what it's worth, Cipher... we have our own doubts about this mission. But whatever happens, our loyalty is to you.
I'm glad to know who I can trust.
I appreciate that.
Anything in particular you find troubling?
What are your doubts?
Thought and action are the same in the nest. There's no concept for "pretending to betray."
Be glad you look more Killik than Imperial.
Just don't draw suspicion.
We forget, sometimes.
Meeting with the SIS guy goes down on the Promenade. You bring the charm, I'll bring the detonite.
